00053 /**************************************************************************/
00064 Ecode_t ezradioStartRx(EZRADIODRV_Handle_t radioHandle)
00065 {
00066   /* Start Receiving packet, channel 0, START immediately, Packet n bytes long */
00067     ezradio_start_rx(radioHandle->packetRx.channel, 0u, 0u,
00068                   EZRADIO_CMD_START_RX_ARG_NEXT_STATE1_RXTIMEOUT_STATE_ENUM_NOCHANGE,
00069                   EZRADIO_CMD_START_RX_ARG_NEXT_STATE2_RXVALID_STATE_ENUM_READY,
00070                   EZRADIO_CMD_START_RX_ARG_NEXT_STATE3_RXINVALID_STATE_ENUM_RX );
00071 
00072     return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_OK;
00073 }
00074 
00076 //  Note: These are internal routines used by ezradio plugin manager.
00077 
00078 /**************************************************************************/
00088 Ecode_t ezradioHandleReceivePlugin( EZRADIODRV_Handle_t radioHandle, EZRADIODRV_ReplyHandle_t radioReplyHandle )
00089 {
00090   if ( radioHandle == NULL )
00091   {
00092     return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00093   }
00094 
00095   /* Check if Pkt Rxd IT is received */
00096   if ( radioReplyHandle->GET_INT_STATUS.PH_PEND & EZRADIO_CMD_GET_INT_STATUS_REP_PH_PEND_PACKET_RX_PEND_BIT)
00097   {
00098 
00099     ezradio_cmd_reply_t radioReplyLocal;
00100 
00101     /* Check how many bytes we received. */
00102     ezradio_fifo_info(0u, &radioReplyLocal);
00103 
00104     /* Read out the RX FIFO content. */
00105     ezradio_read_rx_fifo(radioReplyLocal.FIFO_INFO.RX_FIFO_COUNT, radioHandle->packetRx.pktBuf);
00106 
00107     if ( radioHandle->packetRx.userCallback != NULL )
00108     {
00109       radioHandle->packetRx.userCallback( radioHandle, ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_OK );
00110     }
00111 
00112     /* Note: Workaround for some FIFO issue. */
00113     ezradio_fifo_info(EZRADIO_CMD_FIFO_INFO_ARG_FIFO_RX_BIT, NULL);
00114     ezradioStartRx( radioHandle );
00115 
00116 #if ( ( defined EZRADIO_PLUGIN_AUTO_ACK ) && ( defined EZRADIO_PLUGIN_TRANSMIT ) )
00117     /* Transmit auto acknowledge packet if enabled */
00118     if (radioHandle->autoAck.ackMode  == ezradiodrvAutoAckSkipOne)
00119     {
00120       radioHandle->autoAck.ackMode  = ezradiodrvAutoAckImmediate;
00121     }
00122     else if (radioHandle->autoAck.ackMode  == ezradiodrvAutoAckImmediate)
00123     {
00124       ezradioTransmitAutoAck(radioHandle);
00125     }
00126 #endif
00127 
00128     return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_OK;
00129   }
00130 
00131   /* Reset FIFO */
00132   ezradio_fifo_info(EZRADIO_CMD_FIFO_INFO_ARG_FIFO_RX_BIT, NULL);
00133 
00134   return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_OK;
00135 }
00136 
00138 
00139 #endif //#if ( defined EZRADIO_PLUGIN_RECEIVE )
